ground_truth: Marley noses open the plastic bin and guzzles water from the toilet, then trots back into the bedroom, settles himself on his bed, and enjoys a scratch before lying down. Heavily pregnant, Jenny stirs in bed. Marley pricks up his ears, trots to the bedside, and watches as she sits up suddenly, clutching her stomach. Marley jumps on the bed and watches as Jenny hurriedly packs some clothes. John lifts the car seat box down from the top of a cupboard, which Marley munches open. John leaves Marley playing happily with a big chewy bone and hurries out of the house, while Marley remains busy with the bone as the sun comes up and through the day, until he falls asleep on the floor. John arrives home alone, and they walk out of the back door onto their wooden decking. John sits wearily on the steps as Marley sniffs around nearby. Jenny is indoors with the baby in a carry seat. Marley jumps up at the table with the baby on it, and John gets Marley to sit as Jenny lifts the baby out of the carrier. Marley offers up a welcoming paw. On the pavement, the Grogans' bin is surrounded by chewed empty boxes of baby equipment, and John, accompanied by Marley, comes out of the house with another bin bag as the bin men arrive. They jump to save Marley from the attentions of toddler Patrick. On the beach, John sits with Marley under a palm tree. The big dog sits calmly and watches as a young couple kiss and cuddle on the sand, while John notices the dog watching them and wistfully chews a toothpick as Marley lies down on the sand. In the evening, John and Marley drive up to the house with the headlights on. Marley's looking out of the rear passenger window. From the driver's seat, John looks up and sees Jenny through a window, cuddling Patrick and singing to him. She notices the car, shows Patrick, and waves to her husband, who waves back with a smile. Marley is splayed out on the sofa, watching them. Later, Marley bounds out of the house with John holding his leash. John stops and looks around the nighttime street, noticing a slim teenage girl standing by her car in her driveway and clutching her side. She nods tearfully. They drive through a plush neighborhood, where John lets Patrick out of his car seat. Marley power slides through the house and into the pool. Jenny is staring into the bathroom mirror and leads John into the bathroom, where there are four positive pregnancy tests in the sink. John half smiles and nods hesitantly. The neighborhood features golf courses with sand bunkers, and most of the houses have pools at the rear.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Marley opens the plastic bin to drink from the toilet, then returns to his bed for a scratch before lying down. Pregnant Jenny stirs, and Marley watches as she sits up, clutching her stomach. He jumps on the bed as Jenny hurriedly packs clothes. John retrieves a car seat box, which Marley chews open. John leaves Marley with a chewy bone as he hurries out. Marley stays busy with the bone till he sleeps. John returns home alone and sits wearily on the steps as Marley sniffs nearby. Jenny, indoors with the baby, lifts it from the carrier as Marley offers a paw. Outside, chewed empty boxes surround the Grogans' bin. John, with Marley, takes another bin bag out as bin men arrive. They prevent Marley from bothering toddler Patrick. On the beach, John and Marley sit under a palm tree, and Marley watches a couple kiss on the sand. In the evening, John drives home, sees Jenny through a window cuddling Patrick. Marley, on the sofa, watches them. Later, John holds Marley's leash outside. Noticing a teen girl by her car, they drive through a plush neighborhood where Patrick gets out of the car. Marley races through the house into the pool. Jenny shows John four positive pregnancy tests, and he nods hesitantly. The neighborhood has golf courses with sand bunkers, and most houses have pools.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Marley opens a bin to drink toilet water, returns to his bed, and relaxes. Pregnant Jenny stirs, and Marley approaches as she clutches her stomach, packing clothes. John retrieves a car seat box, which Marley nibbles open. John exits, leaving Marley with a bone until he falls asleep. John returns home; they go outside while Jenny stays in with the baby. Marley jumps up at the table, and John manages him as Jenny lifts the baby, and Marley offers a paw. The Grogans' bin overflows with chewed boxes, and John and Marley take out trash as bin men arrive. They rescue Marley from toddler Patrick's attention. On the beach, Marley watches a couple while John observes him, chewing a toothpick. At night, John and Marley drive home; Jenny waves from inside, cuddling Patrick. Marley watches them. Later, Marley dashes outside as John notices a tearful girl clutching her side. They drive through a neighborhood, let Patrick out, and Marley plays in the pool. Jenny shows John positive pregnancy tests, and he nods. The neighborhood, with golf courses and pools, is lush.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Marley, with his curious nature, gently nudges open the lid of the plastic bin and eagerly laps up water from the toilet. Satisfied, he happily trots back into the cozy bedroom, where he makes himself comfortable on his cushioned bed. He relishes in a satisfying scratch before sprawling out to relax. Meanwhile, Jenny, who is heavily pregnant, stirs restlessly in her sleep. Marley, always alert, perks up his ears, eager to see what is happening. He quickly trots over to the bedside and attentively watches as she sits up abruptly, clutching her stomach in distress. Without hesitation, Marley leaps onto the bed and observes Jenny as she hastily begins packing some clothes. 

In another room, John carefully retrieves the box containing the car seat from its high perch atop the cupboard. Marley, unable to resist, enthusiastically munches on the box. Before leaving, John leaves Marley blissfully occupied with a large, chewy bone and rushes out of the house. Marley continues to be absorbed with his bone, content under the warmth of the rising sun, until fatigue overtakes him and he falls asleep stretched out on the floor. Hours later, John returns home by himself, and together they step outside through the back door onto the inviting wooden decking. John lowers himself onto the steps with a weary sigh, while Marley investigates the area nearby with his inquisitive sniffs. Inside, Jenny is with the newborn baby, carefully nestled in a carry seat. Marley eagerly jumps up at the table where the baby rests, but John gently instructs him to sit as Jenny tenderly lifts the baby out of the carrier. Always affectionate, Marley offers a friendly paw in greeting.

Out on the pavement, surrounding the Grogans' rubbish bin, are numerous chewed empty boxes of baby equipment. John, accompanied by Marley, emerges from the house with yet another bag for the bin men, who arrive just in time to rescue Marley from the enthusiastic attention of toddler Patrick. On the tranquil beach, John sits in the shade of a tall palm tree with Marley by his side, the big dog sitting calmly. They observe a young couple, lost in a romantic embrace on the sand, while John, noticing the dog's interest in the couple, chews on a toothpick and Marley eventually settles down on the soft sand. As evening falls, John and Marley drive back to their home, the car's headlights illuminating the path. From the back passenger window, Marley gazes out. John, seated in the driver's seat, glances up to see Jenny through a window, tenderly cuddling Patrick and softly singing to him. She soon notices the car's arrival, points it out to Patrick, and waves warmly to her husband, who returns the gesture with a smiling wave. Meanwhile, Marley is sprawled out comfortably on the sofa, observing the heartwarming scene.

Later on, Marley energetically bounds out of the house with John holding his leash securely. As they pause, John takes a moment to look around the dimly lit nighttime street. He notices a slender teenage girl standing next to her car in her driveway, clutching her side with an expression of distress. She nods tearfully at John. They then proceed to drive through a luxurious neighborhood, where John carefully releases Patrick from the confines of his car seat. Marley, with unrestrained energy, powers through the house and makes a splash as he dives into the pool. Inside, Jenny stands in front of the bathroom mirror, deep in thought, and leads John into the bathroom. There, in the sink, are four positive pregnancy tests, confirming their news. John offers a tentative half-smile and nods with cautious optimism. The opulent neighborhood is characterized by manicured golf courses with sand bunkers, and most of the grand houses boast inviting pools nestled at the rear.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:

Once satisfied with his drink, he happily trots back into the cozy, inviting bedroom, where he makes himself comfortable on his cushioned bed. There, he takes great pleasure in a satisfying scratch before sprawling out to relax fully. Meanwhile, Jenny, who is heavily pregnant and far along in her pregnancy, stirs restlessly in her sleep. Marley, always on the alert, perks up his ears with attentive curiosity, eager to see what is unfolding. Several hours later, John returns home by himself, and together they step outside through the back door onto the inviting wooden decking. John lowers himself onto the steps with a weary sigh, while Marley investigates the surrounding area nearby with his inquisitive sniffs. Inside the house, Jenny is with the newborn baby, who is carefully nestled in a carry seat. Marley eagerly jumps up at the table where the baby rests, but John gently instructs him to sit as Jenny tenderly lifts the baby out of the carrier. Always affectionate in his manner, Marley offers a friendly paw in greeting.

Out on the pavement, surrounding the Grogans' rubbish bin, are numerous chewed empty boxes of baby equipment. John, accompanied by Marley, emerges from the house with yet another bag intended for the bin men, who arrive just in time to rescue Marley from the enthusiastic attention of toddler Patrick. On the tranquil beach, John sits in the shade of a tall palm tree, with Marley seated calmly by his side. Together, they observe a young couple, caught up in a romantic embrace on the sandy shore, while John, noticing the dog's interest in the couple, chews on a toothpick, and Marley eventually settles down on the soft sand. As evening gently falls, John and Marley drive back to their home, the car's headlights illuminating the path ahead. From the back passenger window, Marley gazes out with curiosity. John, seated in the driver's seat, glances up to see Jenny through a window, tenderly cuddling Patrick and softly singing to him. She soon notices the car's arrival, points it out to Patrick, and waves warmly to her husband, who returns the gesture with a smiling wave. Meanwhile, Marley is sprawled out comfortably on the sofa, observing the heartwarming scene unfold.

Later on, Marley energetically bounds out of the house with John holding his leash securely in hand. As they pause for a moment, John takes a moment to look around the dimly lit nighttime street. He notices a slender teenage girl standing next to her car in her driveway, clutching her side with an expression of distress. She nods tearfully at John. They then proceed to drive through a luxurious neighborhood, where John carefully releases Patrick from the confines of his car seat. Marley, with unrestrained energy, powers through the house and makes a splash as he joyfully dives into the pool. Inside, Jenny stands thoughtfully in front of the bathroom mirror, deep in contemplation, and leads John into the bathroom. There, prominently displayed in the sink, are four positive pregnancy tests, confirming their news. John offers a tentative half-smile and nods with cautious optimism. The opulent neighborhood is characterized by manicured golf courses with sand bunkers, and most of the grand houses boast inviting pools nestled at the rear, providing a sense of luxury and comfort.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Marley nudges the plastic bin open with his nose, positioning himself to drink deeply from the toilet before pulling back and trotting into the bedroom. He finds his bed, settles onto it comfortably, and indulges in a satisfying scratch before sprawling out to lie down. Jenny, who is heavily pregnant, stirs from her sleep, prompting Marley to perk up his ears and move towards the bedside. He watches attentively as Jenny abruptly sits up, her face contorted with concern as she clutches her stomach. Reacting to the urgency, Marley jumps onto the bed, observing closely as Jenny, moving quickly and deliberately, packs a few clothes into a bag. Meanwhile, John takes the box containing the car seat down from the cupboard's top shelf, setting it within Marley's reach, who happily gnaws it open. With Marley contentedly engrossed in chewing a big bone, John steps out of the house in a hurry. Marley remains occupied with the chewy bone as daylight breaks and continues his pastime throughout the day, until exhaustion overtakes him and he dozes off on the floor. John's return home is solitary, and together with Marley, they step through the back door onto their wooden deck. John, clearly tired, lowers himself onto the steps while Marley sniffs the area nearby. Inside, Jenny is tending to their newborn, who rests in a carry seat. Marley jumps up against the table, eager to be involved, and John successfully instructs him to sit as Jenny gently lifts the baby out of the seat. In a gesture of welcome and camaraderie, Marley extends a paw. Meanwhile, on the pavement outside, the Grogans’ trash bin stands amidst chewed-up empty boxes from baby equipment. John, accompanied by Marley, exits the house carrying another bin bag just as the garbage collectors arrive, ready to intercept Marley and steer him away from toddler Patrick’s curious attention. On the beach, John and Marley find solace in the shade of a palm tree. The large dog sits peacefully, observing a young couple sharing a tender kiss and embrace on the sand. John catches sight of Marley watching the couple and, lost in thought, chews on a toothpick while Marley stretches out on the sand next to him. As evening descends, John and Marley drive toward the house with the car's headlights cutting through the darkness. Marley's gaze is fixed out of the rear passenger window as John, while in the driver's seat, catches sight of Jenny through a window, serenely cuddling Patrick and singing softly to him. She sees the car pulling up, points it out to Patrick, and waves warmly at her husband, who returns the gesture with a smile. Inside, Marley sprawls across the sofa, his eyes fixed on the family scene. Later, Marley bursts energetically out of the house, John at his side holding the leash. They pause on the street, taking in the nighttime scene before John notices a slender teenage girl standing in her driveway beside her car, holding her side with a tearful nod. The duo then drives through a luxurious neighborhood, allowing Patrick to exit from his car seat. As they reach home, Marley races through the house with a burst of energy, his momentum carrying him into the inviting waters of the pool. Inside, Jenny gazes at her reflection in the bathroom mirror, leading John into the room where four positive pregnancy tests are positioned in the sink. John offers a tentative smile and nods in response. The neighborhood is characterized by its golf courses with sand bunkers and backyard pools adorning most of the homes.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
Marley drinks water from the toilet, then returns to the bedroom to settle on his bed and relax. A heavily pregnant Jenny stirs, prompting Marley to approach her just as she sits up, clutching her stomach. Marley observes as Jenny hurriedly packs clothes, while John retrieves a car seat box. Marley eagerly chews on the box, then happily plays with a chewy bone as John leaves. As the day progresses, Marley keeps busy with the bone until he falls asleep.

Later, John returns home and steps onto the wooden deck with Marley, while Jenny tends to the baby indoors. Marley curiously approaches the table where the baby is, prompting John to get him to sit as Jenny lifts the baby out and Marley offers a welcoming paw. Outside, John and Marley deal with chewed empty boxes of baby equipment by taking out more trash as the bin men arrive. On the beach, John sits with Marley, who observes a couple kissing while John wistfully chews a toothpick. At evening, John and Marley drive home, with Marley looking out the rear passenger window. John sees Jenny cuddling Patrick and waves back as she notices them. Marley rests on the sofa, watching the family.

Later, Marley bounds out with John during a nighttime walk and notices a teenage girl by her car. After a brief interaction, they drive to a neighborhood with lush golf courses and pools, where John lets Patrick out of his car seat. Marley enthusiastically runs through the house into the pool. Jenny reveals to John four positive pregnancy tests in the bathroom, causing him to smile hesitantly. The neighborhood prominently features golf courses and pools.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Marley, a curious Labrador known for his love of mischief, noses open the plastic bin and guzzles water from the toilet, a behavior quite common in dogs seeking fresh water, then trots back into the bedroom, settles himself on his bed made of soft memory foam, and enjoys a scratch before lying down. Heavily pregnant, Jenny stirs in bed, her due date marked by the calendar on the wall. Marley pricks up his ears, trots to the bedside, and watches as she sits up suddenly, clutching her stomach as if in early labor. Marley jumps on the bed and watches as Jenny hurriedly packs some clothes suitable for a hospital stay. John lifts the car seat box, a brand new model designed for infant safety, down from the top of a cupboard, which Marley, always fascinated by new textures, munches open. John leaves Marley playing happily with a big chewy bone, specially designed for dental health, and hurries out of the house, while Marley remains busy with the bone as the sun comes up over the suburban neighborhood known for its quiet streets and lush gardens, and through the day, until he falls asleep on the floor. John arrives home alone from the hospital, and they walk out of the back door onto their wooden decking, which they had installed for summer evenings. John sits wearily on the steps as Marley sniffs around nearby, exploring the familiar scents. Jenny is indoors with the baby in a carry seat, a gift from her sister. Marley jumps up at the table with the baby on it, a family heirloom, and John gets Marley to sit as Jenny lifts the baby out of the carrier. Marley offers up a welcoming paw, perhaps his way of greeting the newest family member. On the pavement, the Grogans' bin is surrounded by chewed empty boxes of baby equipment, which had arrived in bulk a week prior, and John, accompanied by Marley, comes out of the house with another bin bag as the bin men arrive on their weekly route. They jump to save Marley from the attentions of toddler Patrick, who has just started walking. On the beach, a popular local spot with fine white sand, John sits with Marley under a palm tree. The big dog sits calmly and watches as a young couple kiss and cuddle on the sand, a scene reminiscent of the Grogans' early days, while John notices the dog watching them and wistfully chews a toothpick, a habit he picked up during his college years, as Marley lies down on the sand. In the evening, John and Marley drive up to the house with the headlights on, illuminating the driveway. Marley's looking out of the rear passenger window, his favorite spot because of the breeze. From the driver's seat, John looks up and sees Jenny through a window, cuddling Patrick and singing to him, a lullaby passed down from her own mother. She notices the car, shows Patrick, and waves to her husband, who waves back with a smile. Marley is splayed out on the sofa, an old piece of furniture that has become his domain, watching them. Later, Marley bounds out of the house with John holding his leash, designed for large breeds. John stops and looks around the nighttime street, noticing a slim teenage girl standing by her car in her driveway, a place where she often escapes to think, and clutching her side. She nods tearfully, perhaps from an emotional moment. They drive through a plush neighborhood, where John lets Patrick out of his car seat, a small luxury car model. Marley power slides through the house and into the pool, a luxury feature in Florida homes where the Grogans reside. Jenny is staring into the bathroom mirror, reflecting on life's changes, and leads John into the bathroom, where there are four positive pregnancy tests in the sink, a surprising discovery. John half smiles and nods hesitantly, contemplating the growing family. The neighborhood features golf courses with sand bunkers, popular among the local retirees, and most of the houses have pools at the rear, a testament to the warm climate.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. The big dog sits calmly and watches as a young couple kiss and cuddle on the sand while John notices the dog watching them and wistfully chews a toothpick as Marley lies down on the sand. In the evening John and Marley drive up to the house with the headlights on. Marley's looking out of the rear passenger window. From the driver's seat John looks up and sees Jenny through a window cuddling Patrick and singing to him. She notices the car shows Patrick and waves to her husband who waves back with a smile. Marley is splayed out on the sofa watching them. Later Marley bounds out of the house with John holding his leash. John stops and looks around the nighttime street noticing a slim teenage girl standing by her car in her driveway and clutching her side. She nods tearfully. They drive through a plush neighborhood where John let us Patrick out of his car seat. Marley power slides through the house and into the pool. Jenny is staring into the bathroom mirror and leads John into the bathroom where there are four positive pregnancy. tests in the sink. John half smiles and nods hesitantly. The neighborhood features golf courses with sand bunkers and most of the houses have pools at the rear.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Marley noses open the plastic bin and guzzles water from the toilet. then trots back into the bedroom settles himself on his bed and enjoys a scratch before lying down. Heavily pregnant Jenny stirs in bed. Marley pricks up his ears trots to the bedside and watches as she sits up suddenly clutching her stomach. Marley jumps on the bed and watches as Jenny hurriedly packs some clothes. John lifts the car seat box down from the top of a cupboard which Marley munches open. John leaves Marley playing happily with a big chewy bone and hurries out of the house while Marley remains busy with the bone as the sun comes up and through the day until he falls asleep on the floor. John arrives home alone and they walk out of the back door onto their wooden decking. She nods tearfully. They drive through a plush neighborhood where John let us Patrick out of his car seat. Marley power slides through the house and into the pool. Jenny is staring into the bathroom mirror and leads John into the bathroom where there are four positive pregnancy. tests in the sink. John half smiles and nods hesitantly. The neighborhood features golf courses with sand bunkers and most of the houses have pools at the rear.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Marley noses open the plastic bin and guzzles water from the toilet. then trots back into the bedroom settles himself on his bed and enjoys a scratch before lying down. Heavily pregnant Jenny stirs in bed. tests in the sink. John half smiles and nods hesitantly. The neighborhood features golf courses with sand bunkers and most of the houses have pools at the rear.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Whiskers nudges open the cardboard crate and slurps soup from the bathtub, then skips back into the kitchen, curls up on his mat, and relishes a rub before rolling over. Heavily armored, Stella shifts on the sofa. Whiskers flicks his tail, skips to the window, and observes as she leaps up suddenly, grasping her shoes. Whiskers climbs on the couch and observes as Stella quickly stuffs some books. Luke lifts the stereo box down from the top of a shelf, which Whiskers chews apart. Luke leaves Whiskers playing merrily with a large squeaky toy and rushes out of the apartment, while Whiskers stays engrossed with the toy as the moon rises and through the night, until he dozes off on the rug. Luke returns to the apartment solo, and they stroll out of the front door onto their stone patio. Luke lounges lazily on the chair as Whiskers digs around nearby. Stella is outside with the kitten in a wagon. Whiskers hops up at the bench with the kitten on it, and Luke instructs Whiskers to hop down as Stella lifts the kitten out of the pram. Whiskers presents a welcoming tail wag. On the sidewalk, the Brown's crate is encased by gnawed empty cartons of kitchen gadgets, and Luke, trailed by Whiskers, emerges from the apartment with another garbage sack as the waste collectors arrive. They dive to shield Whiskers from the interest of infant Leo. On the mountain, Luke lounges with Whiskers under an oak tree. The giant cat sits serenely and watches as an elderly duo stroll and hug on the grass, while Luke notices the cat observing them and thoughtfully chews a gumdrop as Whiskers stretches out on the grass. In the morning, Luke and Whiskers sail up to the apartment with the lanterns shining. Whiskers is peering out of the front passenger windshield. From the co-pilot's seat, Luke glances up and sees Stella through a door, hugging Leo and humming to him. She notices the vessel, points to Leo, and salutes her companion, who salutes back with a smirk. Whiskers is sprawled out on the hammock, gazing at them. Later, Whiskers dashes out of the apartment with Luke holding his chain. Luke halts and glances around the twilight field, noticing a broad-shouldered young gentleman standing by his bicycle in his garage and clutching his backpack. He bows cheerfully. They sail through a luxurious suburb, where Luke lets Leo out of his booster seat. Whiskers glides through the apartment and into the hot tub. Stella is examining the kitchen window and directs Luke into the kitchen, where there are four negative weather forecasts in the fridge. Luke half chuckles and bows slightly. The suburb boasts tennis courts with grassy patches, and most of the apartments have gardens in the front.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Marley drinks from the toilet and returns to his bed, while heavily pregnant Jenny stirs and clutches her stomach. Marley jumps on the bed as Jenny packs, and John takes down a car seat box for Marley to chew. After John leaves, Marley is preoccupied with a bone until he falls asleep. Later, John returns home, and they sit outside while Jenny is inside with the baby. Marley offers a paw as John helps Jenny with the baby. Outside, the bin is surrounded by chewed baby equipment boxes as John takes out more trash with Marley. On the beach, John and Marley watch a couple, and Marley lies on the sand. In the evening, John and Marley arrive home, and John waves to Jenny, who is with Patrick. Marley lounges on the sofa. Later, on a walk, John sees a crying teenage girl. They drive through a neighborhood, let Patrick out, and Marley jumps into the pool. Jenny shows John positive pregnancy tests in the bathroom, revealing another pregnancy. Their neighborhood features golf courses and pools.
